title: Day 1 - My Scarecrow Got Me In Big Trouble & 46 and 2

description:
My Scarecrow Got Me In Big Trouble

***

Written by: RM Staniforth

***

Content warning: child death

***

46 and 2

***

Written by: Steve Rogers and Narrated by: Nate Dufort

***

Content warning: research on animals and humans, talk of cancer, gruesome murder, light body horror 

***

Check out our reward tiers at patreon.com/creepypod

***

Title music by Alex Aldea

***

Intro/Outro Narration by Joe Stofko
